meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient as tuberculous after the test results.
meanings.sent2: She was feeling weak and tired due to being tuberculous.
meanings.sent3: The tuberculous teddy bear in the waiting room made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The tuberculous cloud of smoke hung heavily in the air, causing concern.
meanings.sent5: The tuberculous plant wilted and withered under the harsh conditions.

meanings.definition: Caused by or relating to tuberculosis.
meanings.sent1: The hospital implemented strict measures to prevent the spread of tuberculous infections.
meanings.sent2: The tuberculous outbreak was a major concern for public health officials.
meanings.sent3: The tuberculous party decorations added a unique touch to the event.
meanings.sent4: His tuberculous cough echoed through the quiet room, alarming everyone.
meanings.sent5: The tuberculous history of the building added a layer of mystery to its past.
